column2: "prediction": "The Highland Council has announced that the A890 road will be closed for two months starting from the end of February for repair work. The road will be closed between 10pm and 7am every night
column3: with a 13-16m section being repaired. The council has said that the road has been damaged due to heavy rainfall and will take two months to repair. The road connects Loch Aillse and Loch Car"}
